Package org.tal.redstonechips.circuit

Interface Summary
CircuitIndex An interface that enables a circuit library to inform RedstoneChips of all the Circuit classes it provides.
rcTypeReceiver Represents a receiver of input data from /rctype command.
 

Class Summary
BitSetCircuit A Redstone Circuit that treats its inputs as multiple bit sets.
Circuit Represents a RedstoneChips circuit.
CircuitLibrary A JavaPlugin implementation for circuit libraries.
InputPin Represents an input pin of a chip.
InterfaceBlock Represents a chip interface block.
IOBlock Represents an IO chip block.
OutputPin Represents a chip output pin.
 

Enum Summary
InputPin.SourceType The type of a signal change source.
IOBlock.Type
